ygData.subject: Re: My new weapons!! =)
ygData.msgSnippet: Over the weekend I got a Ykesha, traded all my Lambent for it and then replaced all my Lambent with all the quest items I had collected over the last week. All
ygData.messageBody:
Over the weekend I got a Ykesha, traded all my Lambent for it and then
replaced all my Lambent with all the quest items I had collected over the
last week. All my hard work paid off and now I am wielding this fine weapon
(even though it don't proc yet, level 37 isn't it?).
Also today I picked up a Runed Falchion for 1500pp, Obsidian Scim and a
Foreman Tunic. Was this a good deal?

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 35 Songs - Veeshan Server
